original_title: ‘You never want to leave:’ TikTok employees raise concerns about the app’s impact on teens in newly unsealed video | CNN Business
article_summary: TikTok faces allegations of prioritizing user engagement over mental health concerns, as internal videos reveal employees' concerns about the app's addictive nature and potential harm to young users. North Carolina's Attorney General is suing TikTok for deceptive practices, seeking financial penalties and a court order to prevent the company from continuing these practices.</s>
